sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Illinois Century Network Act.

sections.heading: Legislative findings and declarations. The General Assembly

Definitions. Beginning on July 1, 2018, as used in this Act, "anchor institutions" means Illinois schools, institutions of higher education, libraries, museums, research institutions, State agencies, and units of local government
sections.text: Definitions. Beginning on July 1, 2018, as used in this Act, "anchor institutions" means Illinois schools, institutions of higher education, libraries, museums, research institutions, State agencies, and units of local government.

sections.heading: Illinois Century Network. The Illinois Century Network shall be a
sections.text:
service creating and maintaining
high speed telecommunications networks that provide reliable communication
links for wholesale connections with other registered or certified providers and the direct communication needs of various anchor institutions throughout Illinois. The Illinois Century Network may build on existing investments in
networking schools, colleges, and universities, and shall avoid duplication of existing communication networks if those networks are capable of maintaining sufficient capacity to meet the requirements of anchor institutions.

sections.heading: Management of the Illinois Century Network
sections.text: The Department of Innovation and Technology shall govern the staffing and contractual services necessary to support the activities of the Illinois Century Network.
